00021 #include "calvin_files/converters/chp/comparer/CHPCompareCalvintoCalvin.h"

00023 #include "calvin_files/converters/chp/comparer/CHPCompareUtils.h"

00030 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00031 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_utilities;
00032 using namespace affymetrix_comparer;

00035 /*
00036  * Clear the members.
00037  */
00038 void CHPCompareCalvintoCalvin::Clear()
00039 {
00040         differences = "";
00041         calvin1.Clear();
00042         calvin2.Clear();
00043 }
00044 
00045 /*
00046  * Open the files.
00047  */
00048 bool CHPCompareCalvintoCalvin::OpenFiles(const char *file1, const char *file2)
00049 {
00050         CHPFileReader reader1;
00051         CHPFileReader reader2;
00052         try
00053         {
00054                 reader1.SetFilename(file1);
00055                 reader1.Read(calvin1);
00056                 reader2.SetFilename(file2);
00057                 reader2.Read(calvin2);
00058         }
00059         catch (...)
00060         {
00061                 differences = "Failed to read the Calvin file\r\n";
00062                 return false;
00063         }
00064         return true;
00065 }
00066 
00067 /*
00068  * Compare the versions.
00069  */
00070 bool CHPCompareCalvintoCalvin::CompareFiles(const char *file1, const char *file2)
00071 {
00072         Clear();
00073         if (OpenFiles(file1, file2) == false)
00074                 return false;
00075         CompareFiles();
00076         return (differences.length() == 0);
00077 }
00078 
00079 /*
00080  * Compare the versions.
00081  */
00082 void CHPCompareCalvintoCalvin::CompareFiles()
00083 {
00084         CompareHeader();
00085         CompareBackground();
00086         CompareData();
00087 }
00088 
00089 /*
00090  * Compare the header.
00091  */
00092 void CHPCompareCalvintoCalvin::CompareHeader()
00093 {
00094         CompareNonParameterHeader();
00095         CompareAlgParams();
00096         CompareChipSummary();
00097 }
00098 
00099 /*
00100  * Compare the header (not including the alg parameters or chip summary).
00101  */
00102 void CHPCompareCalvintoCalvin::CompareNonParameterHeader()
00103 {
00104         CHPCompareUtils::CompareInts(calvin2.GetCols(), calvin1.GetCols(), differences, "columns");
00105         CHPCompareUtils::CompareInts(calvin2.GetRows(), calvin1.GetRows(), differences, "rows");
00106         if (calvin1.GetAssayType() != CHP_RESEQUENCING_ASSAY_TYPE)
00107                 CHPCompareUtils::CompareInts(calvin2.GetEntryCount(), calvin1.GetEntryCount(), differences, "entry count");
00108         CHPCompareUtils::CompareStrings(calvin2.GetArrayType(), calvin1.GetArrayType(), differences, "array type");
00109         CHPCompareUtils::CompareStrings(calvin2.GetAlgName(), calvin1.GetAlgName(), differences, "alg name");
00110         CHPCompareUtils::CompareStrings(calvin2.GetAlgVersion(), calvin1.GetAlgVersion(), differences, "alg version");
00111         CHPCompareUtils::CompareStrings(calvin2.GetParentCell(), calvin1.GetParentCell(), differences, "parent cel");
00112         CHPCompareUtils::CompareStrings(calvin2.GetProgId(), calvin1.GetProgId(), differences, "prog ID");
00113 }
00114 
00115 /*
00116  * Compare the algorithm parameters.
00117  */
00118 void CHPCompareCalvintoCalvin::CompareAlgParams()
00119 {
00120         ParameterNameValueTypeVector cparams1 = calvin1.GetAlgParams();
00121         ParameterNameValueTypeVector cparams2 = calvin2.GetAlgParams();
00122         CHPCompareUtils::CompareInts((int)cparams1.size(), (int)cparams2.size(), differences, "algorithm parameters size");
00123         if (cparams1.size() != cparams2.size())
00124         {
00125                 return;
00126         }
00127         int n = (int)cparams1.size();
00128         for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00129         {
00130                 ParameterNameValueType &cparam1 = cparams1[i];
00131                 ParameterNameValueType &cparam2 = cparams2[i];
00132                 CHPCompareUtils::CompareStrings(cparam1.GetName(), cparam2.GetName(), differences, "algorithm parameter name");
00133                 CHPCompareUtils::CompareStrings(cparam1.ToString(), cparam2.ToString(), differences, "algorithm parameter value");
00134         }
00135 }
00136 
00137 /*
00138  * Compare the chip summary parameters.
00139  */
00140 void CHPCompareCalvintoCalvin::CompareChipSummary()
00141 {
00142         ParameterNameValueTypeVector cparams1 = calvin1.GetChipSums();
00143         ParameterNameValueTypeVector cparams2 = calvin2.GetChipSums();
00144         CHPCompareUtils::CompareInts((int)cparams1.size(), (int)cparams2.size(), differences, "chip summary size");
00145         if (cparams1.size() != cparams2.size())
00146         {
00147                 return;
00148         }
00149         int n = (int)cparams1.size();
00150         for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00151         {
00152                 ParameterNameValueType &cparam1 = cparams1[i];
00153                 ParameterNameValueType &cparam2 = cparams2[i];
00154                 CHPCompareUtils::CompareStrings(cparam1.GetName(), cparam2.GetName(), differences, "chip summary name");
00155                 CHPCompareUtils::CompareStrings(cparam1.ToString(), cparam2.ToString(), differences, "chip summary value");
00156         }
00157 }

00159 /*
00160  * Compare the background.
00161  */
00162 void CHPCompareCalvintoCalvin::CompareBackground()
00163 {
00164         CHPCompareUtils::CompareInts(calvin1.GetBackgroundZoneCnt(), calvin2.GetBackgroundZoneCnt(), differences, "bg zone count");
00165         if (calvin1.GetBackgroundZoneCnt() != calvin2.GetBackgroundZoneCnt())
00166         {
00167                 return;
00168         }
00169 
00170         int n = calvin1.GetBackgroundZoneCnt();
00171         CHPBackgroundZone czone1;
00172         CHPBackgroundZone czone2;
00173         for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00174         {
00175                 calvin1.GetBackgroundZone(i, czone1);
00176                 calvin2.GetBackgroundZone(i, czone2);
00177                 CHPCompareUtils::CompareFloats(czone1.GetBackground(), czone2.GetBackground(), differences, "background");
00178                 CHPCompareUtils::CompareFloats(czone1.GetCenterX(), czone2.GetCenterX(), differences, "zone centerx");
00179                 CHPCompareUtils::CompareFloats(czone1.GetCenterY(), czone2.GetCenterY(), differences, "zone centery");
00180         }
00181 }
00182 
00183 /*
00184  * Compare the data
00185  */
00186 void CHPCompareCalvintoCalvin::CompareData()
00187 {
00188         if (calvin1.GetAssayType() == CHP_EXPRESSION_ASSAY_TYPE)
00189                 CompareExpression();
00190 
00191         else if (calvin1.GetAssayType() == CHP_GENOTYPING_ASSAY_TYPE)
00192                 CompareGenotyping();
00193 
00194         else if (calvin1.GetAssayType() == CHP_UNIVERSAL_ASSAY_TYPE)
00195                 CompareUniversal();
00196 
00197         else if (calvin1.GetAssayType() == CHP_RESEQUENCING_ASSAY_TYPE)
00198                 CompareResequencing();
00199 }
00200 
00201 /*
00202  * Compare the expression results
00203  */
00204 void CHPCompareCalvintoCalvin::CompareExpression()
00205 {
00206         int n=calvin1.GetEntryCount();
00207         for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00208         {
00209                 CHPExpressionEntry centry1;
00210                 CHPExpressionEntry centry2;
00211                 calvin1.GetEntry(i, centry1);
00212                 calvin2.GetEntry(i, centry2);
00213                 CHPCompareUtils::CompareFloats(centry1.GetDetectionPValue(), centry2.GetDetectionPValue(), differences, "detection p-value");
00214                 CHPCompareUtils::CompareFloats(centry1.GetSignal(), centry2.GetSignal(), differences, "signal"); 
00215                 CHPCompareUtils::CompareInts(centry1.GetNumPairs(), centry2.GetNumPairs(), differences, "pairs");
00216                 CHPCompareUtils::CompareInts(centry1.GetNumPairsUsed(), centry2.GetNumPairsUsed(), differences, "pairs used");
00217                 CHPCompareUtils::CompareInts(centry1.GetDetection(), centry2.GetDetection(), differences, "detection");
00218                 CHPCompareUtils::CompareInts(centry1.GetHasComparisonData(), centry2.GetHasComparisonData(), differences, "comp flag");
00219                 if (centry1.GetHasComparisonData())
00220                 {
00221                         CHPCompareUtils::CompareFloats(centry1.GetChangePValue(), centry2.GetChangePValue(), differences, "change p-value"); 
00222                         CHPCompareUtils::CompareFloats(centry1.GetSigLogRatio(), centry2.GetSigLogRatio(), differences, "slr"); 
00223                         CHPCompareUtils::CompareFloats(centry1.GetSigLogRatioLo(), centry2.GetSigLogRatioLo(), differences, "slr-low"); 
00224                         CHPCompareUtils::CompareFloats(centry1.GetSigLogRatioHi(), centry2.GetSigLogRatioHi(), differences, "slr-high"); 
00225                         CHPCompareUtils::CompareInts(centry1.GetCommonPairs(), centry2.GetCommonPairs(), differences, "common pairs");
00226                         CHPCompareUtils::CompareInts(centry1.GetChange(), centry2.GetChange(), differences, "change");
00227                 }
00228         }
00229 }
00230 
00231 /*
00232  * Compare the genotyping results.
00233  */
00234 void CHPCompareCalvintoCalvin::CompareGenotyping()
00235 {
00236         int n=calvin1.GetEntryCount();
00237         for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00238         {
00239                 CHPGenotypeEntry centry1;
00240                 CHPGenotypeEntry centry2;
00241                 calvin1.GetEntry(i, centry1);
00242                 calvin2.GetEntry(i, centry2);
00243                 CHPCompareUtils::CompareInts(centry1.GetCall(), centry2.GetCall(), differences, "call");
00244                 CHPCompareUtils::CompareFloats(centry1.GetConfidence(), centry2.GetConfidence(), differences, "confidence"); 
00245                 CHPCompareUtils::CompareFloats(centry1.GetAACall(), centry2.GetAACall(), differences, "aa p-value");
00246                 CHPCompareUtils::CompareFloats(centry1.GetABCall(), centry2.GetABCall(), differences, "ab p-value");
00247                 CHPCompareUtils::CompareFloats(centry1.GetBBCall(), centry2.GetBBCall(), differences, "bb p-value");
00248                 CHPCompareUtils::CompareFloats(centry1.GetNoCall(), centry2.GetNoCall(), differences, "no call p-value");
00249                 CHPCompareUtils::CompareFloats(centry1.GetRAS1(), centry2.GetRAS1(), differences, "ras1");
00250                 CHPCompareUtils::CompareFloats(centry1.GetRAS2(), centry2.GetRAS2(), differences, "ras2");
00251         }
00252 }
00253 
00254 /*
00255  * Compare the universal results.
00256  */
00257 void CHPCompareCalvintoCalvin::CompareUniversal()
00258 {
00259         int n=calvin1.GetEntryCount();
00260         for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00261         {
00262                 CHPUniversalEntry centry1;
00263                 CHPUniversalEntry centry2;
00264                 calvin1.GetEntry(i, centry1);
00265                 calvin2.GetEntry(i, centry2);
00266                 CHPCompareUtils::CompareFloats(centry1.GetBackground(), centry2.GetBackground(), differences, "bg"); 
00267         }
00268 }

00270 /*
00271  * Compare resequencing results.
00272  */
00273 void CHPCompareCalvintoCalvin::CompareResequencing()
00274 {
00275         CHPCompareUtils::CompareInts(calvin1.GetEntryCount(), calvin2.GetEntryCount(), differences, "base count");
00276         if (calvin1.GetEntryCount() != calvin2.GetEntryCount())
00277                 return;
00278 
00279         int n=calvin1.GetEntryCount();
00280         CHPReseqEntry ce1;
00281         CHPReseqEntry ce2;
00282         for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00283         {
00284                 calvin1.GetEntry(i, ce1);
00285                 calvin1.GetEntry(i, ce2);
00286                 CHPCompareUtils::CompareInts(ce1.call, ce2.call, differences, "base call");
00287                 CHPCompareUtils::CompareFloats(ce1.score, ce2.score, differences, "base score");
00288         }
00289 
00290         CHPCompareUtils::CompareInts(calvin1.GetForceCnt(), calvin2.GetForceCnt(), differences, "force size");
00291         if (calvin1.GetForceCnt() != calvin2.GetForceCnt())
00292                 return;
00293         n=calvin1.GetForceCnt();
00294         CHPReseqForceCall cf1;
00295         CHPReseqForceCall cf2;
00296         for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00297         {
00298                 calvin1.GetForceCall(i, cf1);
00299                 calvin2.GetForceCall(i, cf2);
00300                 CHPCompareUtils::CompareInts(cf1.position, cf2.position, differences, "force position");
00301                 CHPCompareUtils::CompareInts(cf1.call, cf2.call, differences, "force call");
00302                 CHPCompareUtils::CompareInts(cf1.reason, cf2.reason, differences, "force reason");
00303         }
00304 
00305         CHPCompareUtils::CompareInts(calvin1.GetOrigCnt(), calvin2.GetOrigCnt(), differences, "orig size");
00306         if (calvin1.GetOrigCnt() != calvin2.GetOrigCnt())
00307                 return;
00308         n=calvin1.GetOrigCnt();
00309         CHPReseqOrigCall co1;
00310         CHPReseqOrigCall co2;
00311         for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00312         {
00313                 calvin1.GetOrigCall(i, co1);
00314                 calvin2.GetOrigCall(i, co2);
00315                 CHPCompareUtils::CompareInts(co1.position, co2.position, differences, "orig position");
00316                 CHPCompareUtils::CompareInts(co1.call, co2.call, differences, "orig call");
00317         }
00318 }
